name: Stewed Cabbage
author: Kim
summary: This is a family favorite that my mother-in-law fixed for me while I was visiting her home last year.  Serve over white rice, if desired.
ingredients: 1 medium head cabbage, cut into squares
1 (14.5 ounce) can stewed tomatoes, with liquid
directions: Melt butter in a large saucepan over medium heat
Add onion, celery, and garlic and saute for 3 to 5 minutes, or until translucent
Stir in cabbage, reduce heat to low, and simmer for 15 minutes
Pour in tomatoes and season with salt and pepper to taste
Cover pan and cook over medium heat for 30 to 40 minutes, or until cabbage is tender
